name: Passr
tagline: A web script to electronically distribute passes to students.
body:
# Passr
Passr is a program that allows schools to easily implement an open souse (MIT) library pass distribution system. 

## Demo
<http://lijo.pw/passrdemo>

## Development
It is in very early alpha.  It is somewhat functional.  


## Install
1) Edit the "config.php"  

2) Navigate to "./install/index.php"  

3) Follow the directions.  

4) Done.
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
